constraints.name: capacity_constraint
constraints.description: 每个负载中最多可以放置 k 个物品

constraints.name: subset_constraint
constraints.description: 每种组合的物品必须使用特定的洗涤程序之一进行洗涤
constraints.formal: items_in_pile[i] must be washed with one of the allowed programs for pile i

constraints.name: partition
constraints.description: 所有物品必须被分成若干负载，每个负载使用一个洗涤程序
constraints.formal: all_items = union(loads), where each load uses one program
